Perfect! The implementation is complete. Let me create a summary of the work done:

## Summary

Successfully implemented the Job Relationships section for the RIS HR System according to specification `chore-ee72c0ee-job-relationships-section.md`. 

### Work Completed:

1. **Added mock job relationships data** (apps/js/data/mock-employee.js)
   - Created `jobRelationships` object with 4 relationship types:
     - Dotted-line Managers (1 entry)
     - Matrix Managers (1 entry)
     - HR Business Partners (1 entry)
     - Administrative Assistants (1 entry)
   - Each relationship includes: id, name, nameTh, title, photo, email, phone
   - Added 48 lines of mock data

2. **Added English translations** (apps/locales/en.json)
   - Added 8 new translation keys under `employment` section:
     - jobRelationships, dottedLineManager, matrixManager, hrBusinessPartner, administrativeAssistant, noJobRelationships, viewProfile, contactInfo
   - Added 8 lines

3. **Added Thai translations** (apps/locales/th.json)
   - Added corresponding Thai translations for all job relationship keys
   - Properly encoded UTF-8 Thai text
   - Added 8 lines

4. **Created renderJobRelationshipsSection() method** (apps/js/pages/employment.js)
   - Comprehensive section renderer with:
     - Empty state handling for no relationships
     - Helper function `renderRelationshipCard()` for individual relationship cards
     - Responsive grid layout (2-column on desktop, 1-column on mobile)
     - Clickable names with SPA navigation to profile pages
     - Photo display with fallback images
     - Relationship type badges
     - Contact information with email/phone icons and mailto/tel links
     - Language-aware name display (English/Thai)
     - Collapsible card section
   - Added 146 lines

5. **Integrated into main render method** (apps/js/pages/employment.js)
   - Extracted `jobRelationships` from employee data
   - Added section call after Job Information section
   - Added 3 lines

### Files Modified:
- **apps/js/data/mock-employee.js** - Added job relationships mock data (+48 lines)
- **apps/locales/en.json** - Added English translations (+8 lines)
- **apps/locales/th.json** - Added Thai translations (+8 lines)
- **apps/js/pages/employment.js** - Added renderJobRelationshipsSection() method and integration (+149 lines)

### Total Changes:
- **4 files modified**
- **~213 lines added** across all files

### Features Implemented:
✅ Card-based layout for each relationship type  
✅ Photo display with circular styling  
✅ Clickable names navigating to employee profiles  
✅ Contact information (email & phone) with working links  
✅ Responsive 2-column grid on desktop, 1-column on mobile  
✅ Empty state handling  
✅ Bilingual support (English/Thai)  
✅ Collapsible section  
✅ Material Icons integration  
✅ Hover effects and transitions  
✅ Accessibility-friendly with semantic HTML

The implementation follows the established patterns from other sections (Advanced Personal Information, Work Permit) and is ready for visual testing in the browser.
